name: Santa's Quest
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Escape: Leave Level/Game

Backspace: Restart Level

F11: Toggle Fullscreen/Window Mode

________________________________________

Where are all the presents?
Christmas eve is approaching, but the presents have gone missing. To rescue christmas, Santa Clause himself has to deal with this.

Jump, roll, fall and fly as a bouncy Santa through 24 exciting levels and help him to find the lost presents. Every day a new level will be unlocked and the adventure continues.

Features:
- Completely physics-based gameplay
- Like an Advent calender: One new level every day
- 24 varied levels with numerous challenges
- Colorful graphics and a festive soundtrack
- Collect all presents in one level and you obtain one of 24 puzzle pieces
